title: Lynda - WordPress DIY: Restaurant Website
description:
Lynda - WordPress DIY: Restaurant Website

This Course will be good to the Best for DL withing 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.


1h 45m Beginner Sep 10, 2015  | Uploaded in Oct 8, 2015 by 2boweb
Subject: Web 
Software: WordPress 
Author: Morten Rand-Hendriksen 


Build a great website for your restaurant with WordPress. You don't need a developer; learn to do it yourself (DIY) in these short, project-focused lessons from expert Morten Rand-Hendriksen. Morten walks through every step in the process: from site planning and finding the right theme, to adding custom content and navigation, to using plugins to display menus and take reservations online. Using these tips, you'll be able to create a stylish, feature-rich website for your restaurant with very little overhead.â€¨â€¨Find more courses in this series in our WordPress DIY playlist.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Making a basic content inventory
	â€¢	Finding a suitable theme
	â€¢	Adding a food menu page
	â€¢	Customizing fonts, colors, and navigation
	â€¢	Adding a contact form and reservations widget with Jetpack
	â€¢	Testing the site
